reviewText: They are cut down and edited because they are trying to censor the truth from the internet. Either that or they don't know what they are doing. Luckily, free countries allow their citizens to learn the truth, from many sources. Not just one poorly produced movie.
ALL of these 'Battlefield in blue' with the eagle covers are cut down versions of the originals and only run half as long.  My advice is don't bother.
